resources.string:
- Access the (Config Parameters) screen.
 - Type your tracker phone number in (Tracker Number) field.
 - Type your password in (Password) field.
 - Access the (Config Commands) screen.
 - Send (Begin) command.
 - Wait for tracker callback.
 - Send (Authorize Number) command and authorize the number configured previously (type the same number).
 - Wait for tracker callback.

- Access the (Config Commands) screen.
 - Send (Set APN) command (example: apn.oper.com.br).
 - Wait for tracker callback.
 - Send (Set APN User/Pass) command.
 - Wait for tracker callback.
 - Send (Set Server IP and Port) command.
 - Wait for tracker callback.

- Access the (Operation Commands) screen.
 - Send (Change to GPRS) command.
 - Send (Activate Auto Track) command.

This app is just a command sender.
 I am not responsible for the use of it.
